message: Michael del Castillo you seem incredibly uninformed with so many of your statements. You really think Russians are safer because of Putin? I encourage you to look up the conflict in Chechnya, the Georgia-Russian conflict, the conflict in the Ukraine. The numerous terrorist acts that have occurred in Russia in direct response to Russia's foreign and domestic policies. Even as recent as the last month there was a Russian airliner shot down in the Middle East in addition to the military plane brought down over Turkey.
Precisely.

I was told last year that my kindergartener was allowed a snack of whatever I wanted to give her that she can eat it within 15 minutes. But throughout the entire school year almost every week one to two times a week, she would come home with her treat still in her bag because her teacher said she could not eat it. If the school is not going to feed my child what I sent with them then they can take it upon themselves to bring it out of their own pocket to do so.

Trump won -HILLARY CONCEDED, SHE IS OUT OF THE RACE PERMANENTLY!!--Does not make any difference what she wants the law is on Mr Trump side. Even if the rogue electors are somehow able to block Trump from securing enough electoral votes, the Republican House of Representatives will vote him into office anyway. Clearly, this whole thing is more about the principle of the matter, as Democrats want to keep our country divided rather than rallying behind Trump. Michael Baca is one member of the Electoral College from Colorado who is leading the charge to block Trump before voting takes place on December 19.
